name: Weiss Schwarz Card Game Simulator V0.1
name_original: Weiss Schwarz Card Game Simulator V0.1
description:
I've been working on this game for over a year and it's finally ready to share.  Play Bushiroad's anime themed card game Wiess Schwarz over LAN or against the computer.  The AI isn't finished yet, but you can still use it to test your decks.  Card effects are fully automated.  Includes a deck editor.   Weiss Schwarz is one of my favorite games so I had fun making this.  Expect somewhat regular updates for this game.

Currently includes the following sets with more on the way:

  • Disgaea (All Cards)
  • Sword Art Online (Volume 1)
  • Haruhi Suzumiya (All cards + JP exclusives)
  • Batman Ninja (Trial Deck Only)
  • Gurren Lagann (Partial)
  • Konosuba (Partial)
  • Familiar of Zero (All Cards)
  • Nichijou (All Cards)

If you notice any bugs with specific cards please let me know (Especially things that might be hard to notice, like a card having the wrong trait, or it's trigger icon not working.)

Known bugs:  For some reason when a card is sent from the stage to the stock it turns face up and I have no idea why.   The AI is not finished and doesn't know how to use card effects, but it will try to reverse your characters and maximize it's characters power using assists.

Wiess Schwarz official rules: https://en.ws-tcg.com/rules/basic/
